itemLabel: Kathleen Richardson, Baroness Richardson of Calow

wikipedia_page.main: Kathleen Margaret Richardson, Baroness Richardson of Calow,  (born 24 February 1938) is a British Methodist Minister. Created a life peer in 1998, she was a crossbench member of the House of Lords until her retirement in 2018.
